titles.title: Medicare Dental Benefit Act of 2019
Medicare Dental Benefit Act of 2019
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of dental services under the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Medicare Dental Benefit Act of 2019
This bill provides for Medicare coverage of dental and oral health services, including routine diagnostic and preventive services, basic and major dental services, and emergency care; dental prostheses are also covered. Currently, such services are excluded from Medicare coverage.
